3: בְּזֹ֛את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>Thus</n> יָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>shall Aaron</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>into the holy</n> בְּפַ֧ר <sup>6499 </sup> <n>bullock</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> בָּקָ֛ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>bull</n> לְחַטָּ֖את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for a sin offering</n> וְאַ֥יִל <sup>352 </sup> <n>and a ram</n> לְעֹלָֽה׃ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>for a burnt offering</n>

16: וְכִפֶּ֣ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>And he shall make an atonement</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>for the holy</n> מִטֻּמְאֹת֙ <sup>2932 </sup> <n>[place] because of the uncleanness</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וּמִפִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>and because of their transgressions</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>in all their sins</n> וְכֵ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>and thus</n> יַעֲשֶׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and so shall he do</n> לְאֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>for the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֔ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> הַשֹּׁכֵ֣ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>that remaineth</n> אִתָּ֔ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּת֖וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among them in the midst</n> טֻמְאֹתָֽם׃ <sup>2932 </sup> <n>of their uncleanness</n>
17: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and for all</n> אָדָ֞ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>And there shall be no man</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be in</n> בְּאֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>in the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֗ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> בְּבֹא֛וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>when he goeth</n> לְכַפֵּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>in to make an atonement</n> בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in the holy</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> צֵאת֑וֹ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>[place] until he come out</n> וְכִפֶּ֤ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>and have made an atonement</n> בַּעֲדוֹ֙ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>about</n> וּבְעַ֣ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>and for</n> בֵּית֔וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>for himself and for his household</n> וּבְעַ֖ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>about</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and for all</n> קְהַ֥ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>and for all the congregation</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
18: וְיָצָ֗א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And he shall go out</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>unto the altar</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>is</n> לִפְנֵֽי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that [is] before</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְכִפֶּ֣ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>and make an atonement</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְלָקַ֞ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>for it and shall take</n> מִדַּ֤ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of the blood</n> הַפָּר֙ <sup>6499 </sup> <n>of the bullock</n> וּמִדַּ֣ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and of the blood</n> הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>of the goat</n> וְנָתַ֛ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and put</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> קַרְנ֥וֹת <sup>7161 </sup> <n>[it] upon the horns</n> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>of the altar</n> סָבִֽיב׃ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n>
19: וְהִזָּ֨ה <sup>5137 </sup> <n>And he shall sprinkle</n> עָלָ֧יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>some</n> הַדָּ֛ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of the blood</n> בְּאֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <sup>676 </sup> <n>upon it with his finger</n> שֶׁ֣בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> פְּעָמִ֑ים <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> וְטִהֲר֣וֹ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>and cleanse</n> וְקִדְּשׁ֔וֹ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>it and hallow</n> מִטֻּמְאֹ֖ת <sup>2932 </sup> <n>it from the uncleanness</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
20: וְכִלָּה֙ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>And when he hath made an end</n> מִכַּפֵּ֣ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>of reconciling</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>the holy</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֹ֥הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>[place] and the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֖ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>and the altar</n> וְהִקְרִ֖יב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>he shall bring</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>goat</n> הֶחָֽי׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>the live</n>
21: וְסָמַ֨ךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>shall lay</n> אַהֲרֹ֜ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>And Aaron</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n> [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָ֗יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> ק) עַ֨ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon the head</n> הַשָּׂעִיר֮ <sup>8163 </sup> <n>goat</n> הַחַי֒ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the live</n> וְהִתְוַדָּ֣ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>and confess</n> עָלָ֗יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲוֹנֹת֙ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>over him all the iniquities</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>and all their transgressions</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>in all their sins</n> וְנָתַ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>putting</n> אֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>them upon the head</n> הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>of the goat</n> וְשִׁלַּ֛ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and shall send [him] away</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hands</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> עִתִּ֖י <sup>6261 </sup> <n>of a fit</n> הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>into the wilderness</n>
22: וְנָשָׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall bear</n> הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>And the goat</n> עָלָ֛יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>upon him all their iniquities</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto a land</n> גְּזֵרָ֑ה <sup>1509 </sup> <n>not inhabited</n> וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and he shall let go</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׂעִ֖יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>the goat</n> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n>
23: וּבָ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> אַהֲרֹן֙ <sup>175 </sup> <n>And Aaron</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> אֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>into the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֔ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> וּפָשַׁט֙ <sup>6584 </sup> <n>and shall put off</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּגְדֵ֣י <sup>899 </sup> <n>garments</n> הַבָּ֔ד <sup>906 </sup> <n>the linen</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לָבַ֖שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>which he put on</n> בְּבֹא֣וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>when he went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>into the holy</n> וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <sup>3240 </sup> <n>[place] and shall leave</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
24: וְרָחַ֨ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>And he shall wash</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּשָׂר֤וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>his flesh</n> בַמַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>with water</n> בְּמָק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>place</n> קָד֔וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>in the holy</n> וְלָבַ֖שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>and put on</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּגָדָ֑יו <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garments</n> וְיָצָ֗א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and come forth</n> וְעָשָׂ֤ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and offer</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>his burnt offering</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֹלַ֣ת <sup>5930 </sup> <n>and the burnt offering</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> וְכִפֶּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>and make an atonement</n> בַּעֲד֖וֹ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>about</n> וּבְעַ֥ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>and for</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for himself and for the people</n>
25: וְאֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> חֵ֥לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>And the fat</n> הַֽחַטָּ֖את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>of the sin offering</n> יַקְטִ֥יר <sup>6999 </sup> <n>shall he burn</n> הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>upon the altar</n>
26: וְהַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֤חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>And he that let go</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׂעִיר֙ <sup>8163 </sup> <n>the goat</n> לַֽעֲזָאזֵ֔ל <sup>5799 </sup> <n>for the scapegoat</n> יְכַבֵּ֣ס <sup>3526 </sup> <n>shall wash</n> בְּגָדָ֔יו <sup>899 </sup> <n>his clothes</n> וְרָחַ֥ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and bathe</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>his flesh</n> בַּמָּ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>in water</n> וְאַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> כֵ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>into the camp</n>
27: וְאֵת֩ <sup>853 </sup> פַּ֨ר <sup>6499 </sup> <n>And the bullock</n> הַֽחַטָּ֜את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>[for] the sin offering</n> וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <sup>853 </sup> שְׂעִ֣יר <sup>8163 </sup> <n>and the goat</n> הַֽחַטָּ֗את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>[for] the sin offering</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> הוּבָ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>was brought in</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דָּמָם֙ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>whose blood</n> לְכַפֵּ֣ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>to make atonement</n> בַּקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in the holy</n> יוֹצִ֖יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>[place] shall [one] carry forth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מִח֣וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without</n> לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>the camp</n> וְשָׂרְפ֣וּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and they shall burn</n> בָאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>in the fire</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֹרֹתָ֥ם <sup>5785 </sup> <n>their skins</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּשָׂרָ֖ם <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and their flesh</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּרְשָֽׁם׃ <sup>6569 </sup> <n>and their dung</n>
28: וְהַשֹּׂרֵ֣ף <sup>8313 </sup> <n>And he that burneth</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> יְכַבֵּ֣ס <sup>3526 </sup> <n>them shall wash</n> בְּגָדָ֔יו <sup>899 </sup> <n>his clothes</n> וְרָחַ֥ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and bathe</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>his flesh</n> בַּמָּ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>in water</n> וְאַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> כֵ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>he shall come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>into the camp</n>
29: וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֖ם לְחֻקַּ֣ת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>And [this] shall be a statute</n> עוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִי <sup>7637 </sup> <n>unto you [that] in the seventh</n> בֶּֽעָשׂ֨וֹר <sup>6218 </sup> <n>on the tenth</n> לַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>[day] of the month</n> תְּעַנּ֣וּ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>ye shall afflict</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>your souls</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> מְלָאכָה֙ <sup>4399 </sup> <n>no work</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <sup>249 </sup> <n>at all [whether it be] one of your own country</n> וְהַגֵּ֖ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>or a stranger</n> הַגָּ֥ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>that sojourneth</n> בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n>
30: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For on that day</n> הַזֶּ֛ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> יְכַפֵּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>shall [the priest] make an atonement</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> לְטַהֵ֣ר <sup>2891 </sup> <n>for you to cleanse</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> מִכֹּל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חַטֹּ֣אתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>from all your sins</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> תִּטְהָֽרוּ׃ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>you [that] ye may be clean</n>
31: שַׁבַּ֨ת <sup>7676 </sup> <n>It [shall be] a sabbath</n> שַׁבָּת֥וֹן <sup>7677 </sup> <n>of rest</n> הִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לָכֶ֔ם וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <sup>6031 </sup> <n>unto you and ye shall afflict</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>your souls</n> חֻקַּ֖ת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>by a statute</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
32: וְכִפֶּ֨ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>stead shall make the atonement</n> הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>And the priest</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יִמְשַׁ֣ח <sup>4886 </sup> <n>whom he shall anoint</n> אֹת֗וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יְמַלֵּא֙ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>accomplish</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>able</n> לְכַהֵ֖ן <sup>3547 </sup> <n>to minister in the priest's office</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>place</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>in his father's</n> וְלָבַ֛שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>and shall put on</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּגְדֵ֥י <sup>899 </sup> <n>clothes</n> הַבָּ֖ד <sup>906 </sup> <n>the linen</n> בִּגְדֵ֥י <sup>899 </sup> <n>garments</n> הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>[even] the holy</n>
33: וְכִפֶּר֙ <sup>3722 </sup> <n>And he shall make an atonement</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִקְדַּ֣שׁ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>sanctuary</n> הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>for the holy</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֹ֧הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>for the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֛ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>and for the altar</n> יְכַפֵּ֑ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>and he shall make an atonement</n> וְעַ֧ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>for the priests</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and for all</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and for all the people</n> הַקָּהָ֖ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> יְכַפֵּֽר׃ <sup>3722 </sup> <n>and he shall make an atonement</n>
34: וְהָֽיְתָה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall have</n> זֹּ֨את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לָכֶ֜ם לְחֻקַּ֣ת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>statute</n> עוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>And this shall be an everlasting</n> לְכַפֵּ֞ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>unto you to make an atonement</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּנֵ֤י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> חַטֹּאתָ֔ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for all their sins</n> אַחַ֖ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>once</n> בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>a year</n> וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And he did</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>as the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> פ
